title: Experimental Demonstration and Discussion-Based Learning Course for Understanding Electric Circuit Concepts

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of fundamental electrical circuit concepts (voltage, current, resistance) and experience constructing simple circuits
context.additional_context: Blended learning using simulation tools and LMS in digital device-provided environments

learning_goals: Learners can quantitatively explain various electrical circuit phenomena by applying Ohm’s Law and Kirchhoff’s Laws.
Learners can identify phenomena in complex circuit problems and perform argumentative thinking linking scientific principles with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can share interpretations of electrical circuit phenomena with peers at least three times on online discussion boards and incorporate feedback.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
